item.title: American Hi-Fi - The Breakup Song
item.description:
KY: 61253

I can’t believe
I hung a round
With you
all this time
You drove me crazy
with your old girl
Your out of
your mind
I’m counting on ufo’s
to beam me up
I just don’t know
how long
I can take this shit
I’m over it
Girl you gotta go
it’s over were over
Just like in crimson
and clover
Were sinking
and I’m thinking
How the hell did
we get so stupid
It’s the end
ex girlfriend
I don’t care
what you think
Of me now
so long your gone
This is
the break up song
One more thing
be fore your go
Would you please give
me my record back
My bloody valentine
the pixies
Cheap trick and
back in black
You can keep the dog
we bought
But you can’t go
near the standerd bar
Don’t hang ground
don’t call my friend
They don’t know
who you are
It’s over
we’re over
Just like in crimson
and clover
Were sinking
and I’m thinking
How the hell did
we get so stupid
It’s the end
ex girlfriend
I don’t care
what you think
Of me now
so long your gone

the break up song

your gone
